Detailed Description

Interface to generic data blob.

Member Function Documentation

virtual Span<uint8_t> zserio::IBlobBuffer::data ( )
pure virtual

Get the blob data span.

Returns
Span representing the blob data. The returned blob is valid until the instance of the IBlob is destroyed or until the resize method is called.

Implemented in zserio::BlobBuffer< ALLOC >.

virtual void zserio::IBlobBuffer::resize ( std::size_t  size)
pure virtual

Resize the blob.

Parameters
sizeNew size of the blob. Returned blob is guaranteed to have at least this number of bytes.
